\maketitle\abstracts{We present a recent analysis of $\varepsilon'/
\varepsilon$ in the $1/N_c$ expansion. We show that the $1/N_c$ 
corrections to the matrix element of $Q_6$ are large and positive, 
indicating a $\Delta I=1/2$ enhancement similar to the one of $Q_1$ 
and $Q_2$ which dominate the CP conserving amplitude. This enhances 
the CP ratio and can bring the standard model prediction close to 
the measured value for central values of the parameters.}
